verbose_text: A DNA probe of 600 bp in length including the predicted riRNA promoter of the rrsD gene was prepared by PCR amplification (XREF_FIG and XREF_TABLE, probe G1) and subjected to the gel shift assay in parallel with the 656 bp-long probe containing the major promoters, P1 and P2, of the same rrnD operon (XREF_FIG and XREF_TABLE, probe G2).
evidence: promoters, P1 and P2, of the same rrnD operon
